title: P2 Sweet Caporal pin Walter Johnson for sale

posts.post_title: P2 Sweet Caporal pin Walter Johnson for sale
posts.post_content: Very pleasing PSA 4. $350.00 delivered. Sales tax applies if delivery in New York. I accept Zelle or check/money order, no PayPal. As always, "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations or requests for further information, etc. Please reply to my email address [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please check out my newly updated website below. Thank you for viewing.
